channel.title: Help with run_lserver
channel.description:
Picture : [IMG]http://i653.photobucket.com/albums/uu256/dstopgunner/help.jpg[/img]
I went to guide and downloaded all
- Apeache: http://www.uniontransit.com/apache/ant/binaries/apache-ant-1.7.0-bin.zip
- Xampplite: http://www.apachefriends.org/download.php?xampplite-win32-1.6.6a.zip
- Java JDK: [u]https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewProductDetail-Start?ProductRef=java_ee_sdk-5_05-oth-JPR@CDS-CDS_Developer[/u] Place them all in C:/ (Not in the same folder)
RSCD v25:
- Rscd v25 Source http://rapidshare.com/files/126396865/Rscd_v25.rar.html
- Rscd v25 Www Files http://rapidshare.com/files/126398705/www.rar.html
- Rscd .sql Database http://rapidshare.com/files/126399021/Rscd.rar.html
And for the java I installed the jdk above.
My variables under system variables are
Variable name : Path Variable value: D:\Sun\SDK\jdk\bin
Yes i installed to D: drive.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 17, 2009, 08:18:01 am[/size][hr]bump for help =/

item.title: Help with run_lserver
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

It needs to be your computers default gateway, that ip is his default gateway if you did it on his computer.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with run_lserver
item.description:
@00123987 wrote:

yes i typed it correctly but it say not recognised as internal or batch program and stuff… i used ipconfig on my bros comp the one i share internet with it say 192.168.1.254 as default gateway , i replaced all my 220… ips with 192.168.1.254 and still get same error =/

Read full topic

item.title: Help with run_lserver
item.dc:creator: @froggie froggie
item.description:
@froggie wrote:

If you used ifconfig, thats for unix while ipconfig is dos.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with run_lserver
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

00123987:

yes i am sharing internet with my bro , and i did ipconfig it say its not recognised as a internal or external stuf… blah blah blah help pls how do i make it work

What OS are you using…If your using windows then make sure your typing ipconfig right.

Read full topic

yes i am sharing internet with my bro , and i did ipconfig it say its not recognised as a internal or external stuf… blah blah blah help pls how do i make it work

item.title: Help with run_lserver
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Are you using a router?

If so, your ips in world.xml and ls.conf needs to be your 192.168… ip

Start>run>cmd>ipconfig If you dont know where to find it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with run_lserver
item.description:
@00123987 wrote:

Still not working…

I downloaded “https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewProductDetail-Start?ProductRef=jdk-6u13-javafx-1.1.1-oth-JPR@CDS-CDS_Developer”

Enviromental variables :
variable name : PATH
variable path : C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin

anything i done wrongly?

run_lserver.bat
is

@echo off
set PATH=%PATH%;D:\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin
set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javaw.exe 1.6.0_05
ant runls
pause

World.xml
is

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>



Open RSCD_v25 Config
1
220.255.7.152
43594
Runescape
US
300
1
220.255.7.152
34522
password

(must i change lspass? , my real pw is test)

ls.conf
is

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>



Open RSCD_v25-LS Config
localhost
rscd
root
test
220.255.7.152
34522
test
220.255.7.152
8181

Thats all , how do i compile the .conf file?

all the ls.conf and world.xml are in D:\rsc\server\

I went to D:\rsc\server\Compression Tool and clicked on all the .bat files
compile.bat compileall.bat decompileall.bat and run.bar (is this how i compile?)

after all that i clicked run_lserver.bat is it still give the image above…

help please

Read full topic

item.title: Help with run_lserver
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Ctrl+Alt+del and end all java process, run again and if you still get the same error your ip’s in world.xml and ls.conf are wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with run_lserver

@00123987 wrote:

Picture :

I went to guide and downloaded all

  • Apeache:
    http://www.uniontransit.com/apache/ant/binaries/apache-ant-1.7.0-bin.zip

    Place them all in C:/ (Not in the same folder)
